ValidationRule.description: Date of joining should not be past date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( RecordTypeId = $Label.Resource_Recordtype_Id , OR( AND (ISNEW(),EMS_EM_JD__c < TODAY()) , AND(ISCHANGED(EMS_EM_JD__c),EMS_EM_JD__c < TODAY())), False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Date of Joining cannot be a past date
